item.title: teaching material
item.description: supervisions I am currently supervising three msc theses on Data Science for Marketing Analytics at Erasmus School of Economics I am currently supervising three msc theses on Econometrics at Erasmus School of Economics I am currently supervising six bsc theses at Erasmus School of Economics on Adachi and Trendafilov (2018) I am currently supervising one master thesis within the II level master “Quantitative methods and models for decision support” at University of Rome UnitelmaSapienza
